post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, May 11
post.Content:
A relatively quiet week this week, but there are a few interesting links worth reporting. Enjoy! :-)

JavaFX

  • Eugene Ryzhikov from Gluon posted a teaser video of Gluon Glisten.
  • Rob Terp has blogged about automatically sorting a JavaFX TableView.
  • Ren√© Jahn has posted about JavaFX TableView and TreeView lazy loading.
  • Glenn Martin has posted two new projects to GitHub: firstly, JavaFX/FXML "Data" Tag support, which allows the addition of arbitrary metadata to FXML source files. Secondly, an extended implementation of the SVG2FXML converter, intended as a drop-in replacement along side it.

That was quick! :-) Catch you all again next week.
